message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and features, it's worth more than $150 to me. Considering its value to you, I would like to propose a price of $120 for this product. This offer is exclusive to you and is designed to provide you with an excellent opportunity to benefit from its value at a reasonable price. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget.
